name: Kasuni Maheeshi Abeykoon
title: I-O Psychologist
bio: I am an I-O Psychologist with a strong interest in Organizational Psychology, Neuroscience, Neuromarketing, and Consumer Psychology. I completed my degree in Psychology and Business at CIIHE - Colombo International Institute of Higher Education Sri Lanka. My research focuses on understanding human behavior in organizational contexts and the intersection of psychology with business applications.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Psychology and Business
education.institution: CIIHE - Colombo International Institute of Higher Education
education.details: Specialized in Organizational Psychology and Business Applications
